configuration_comments._comment1: Add players to 'players_to_track' or use the --url command-line argument.
configuration_comments._comment2: In 'general_settings', 'max_matches_to_analyze' (null=all) and 'max_history_pages_to_scan' (null=all) limit the scan scope.
configuration_comments._comment3: In 'database_options', set 'force_full_reanalysis' to true to ignore saved data and re-download everything.
